summary.summary:
Quality focused software developer with 4+ proven work experience on Front-End and Hybrid Mobile technologies.

Developed from zero the Intrideo mobile app (HR related app). Used (at the time) by 1000+ users. Adopted and pushed Hikey WeMatch full-stack app (web-mobile-backend) to MVP phase. Used (at the time) by 800+ users. Both were developed using hybrid technologies (Cordova).

I am passionate about Javascript eco-system and Front-End subdomain (React). Currently exploring React-Native as a step towards native mobile development.
